motivationalQuotes.quote: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Strength does not come from the physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
motivationalQuotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivationalQuotes.quote: The body achieves what the mind believes.
motivationalQuotes.author: Napoleon Hill

motivationalQuotes.quote: Don't wish for it. Work for it.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind you have to convince.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown

motivationalQuotes.quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in determination.
motivationalQuotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

motivationalQuotes.quote: Success isn't always about greatness. It's about consistency.
motivationalQuotes.author: Dwayne Johnson

motivationalQuotes.quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
motivationalQuotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

motivationalQuotes.quote: Every day is a new beginning. Take a deep breath and start again.
motivationalQuotes.author: Unknown
